title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the expected result is that the table icons and column icons will show up.
EB: However, the actual result is that the column icons do not show up.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing the column icons to not show up when expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector.
